rootItem.title: Version-agnostic anchor resource for codelist C96784

self.title: CDISC SDTM Tumor Identification Test Code Terminology

definition: Terminology relevant to the test codes that describe tumor assessments for identification purposes.
name: Tumor Identification Test Code
preferredTerm: CDISC SDTM Tumor Identification Test Code Terminology

terms.definition: An indication that multiple tumors have coalesced into one tumor.
An indication that a tumor has been located and characterized.
An indication that a single tumor has divided into two or more tumors.
